name: Dino Defense (Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2)
description:
Your time machine has brought you back 66 million years. A wormhole has opened and dinosaurs are trying to make it back to present day! Stop them at all cost!

**This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2. I only started learning game dev a month ago, so any support is so appreciated! **

Open to constructive criticism, but also please (if you can) be specific in HOW to change things because I am still new and may not know how to do so. 

Thanks! :)
